author: jstrachan
msg: Introduced JspNestedException to preserve compatability with JSP1.1 and still capture real stack traces when an exception occurs within the XTags custom tags.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to fix java.lang.Double types of variables causing a ClassCastException. Also ensured that root exceptions are passed into all JspException constructors to aid debugging in future.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added stylesheet patch and extra test case
